pr_title: Add primary keys to pg_class and pg_index

timeline.message: migrate pg_catalog table to use SystemTable Builder
migrate pg_class table to use SystemTable Builder
Introduce custom classes for pg_class and pg_index
convert entries for pg_class and pg_index to inner classes
convert entries for pg_class and pg_index to inner classes
convert entries for pg_class and pg_index to inner classes

timeline.bodyText: Primary keys should actually not have a reltuples value, not relevant for the kafka usecase. Fixing this is a bit of a effort, not sure if it is worth.
timeline.author: mkleen

replies.bodyText: Could we use  relkind / relationType to avoid the numDocs call then?
replies.author: mfussenegger
